# Infrrd

Infrrd is a California-based intelligent document processing provider offering AI-powered data extraction solutions for insurance, mortgage, banking, and manufacturing industries.

![Infrrd](./assets/infrrd.png)

## Overview

Infrrd, founded in 2015 by CEO Amit Jnagal and headquartered in San Jose, California, develops intelligent document processing technology combining deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing for automating complex document workflows. The company serves global enterprises across mortgage, insurance, banking, accounting, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and logistics sectors.

The platform has processed over 100 billion pages across 1,000+ document types in 22+ languages. Gartner named Infrrd a Leader in its 2025 Magic Quadrant for Intelligent Document Processing, and Everest Group recognized the company as a Leader and Star Performer in its PEAK Matrix assessment. In October 2025, Infrrd launched Ally, an agentic AI workforce for mortgage auditing that automates up to 80% of the audit process.

## Key Features

- **Titan IDP Platform**: [Intelligent document processing](../../capabilities/document-understanding/index.md) with deep learning models for complex documents
- **ML-OCR**: Machine learning-powered [optical character recognition](../../capabilities/ocr/index.md) supporting 22+ languages
- **Ally Agentic AI**: Autonomous AI agents for mortgage QC workflows including income, credit, asset, appraisal verification
- **Low-Code Configuration**: Quick adaptation to new document types without extensive development
- **Pre-Trained Models**: Industry-specific extraction for mortgage, insurance, and financial documents
- **Complex Table Extraction**: Advanced recognition for tabular data structures
- **Human-in-the-Loop**: Efficient validation and exception handling interfaces
- **Domain-Specific Solutions**: Tailored processing for specialized industry documents
- **No-Touch Processing**: Straight-through document automation
- **Image Studio**: Document image enhancement and preprocessing

## Use Cases

### Insurance Claims Processing

Insurance carriers process claim forms, medical reports, invoices, and supporting documentation through Infrrd's platform. The system extracts policyholder details, incident information, damage assessments, and validates data against business rules. AI models understand varying document layouts without requiring templates for each form type, integrating extracted data with claims management systems.

### Mortgage Document Processing

Mortgage lenders automate processing of loan applications, income verification, bank statements, tax returns, and appraisals using Infrrd's Ally platform. The agentic AI executes complete QC workflows including income calculation, credit analysis, asset verification, title review, and fraud detection. The system audits up to 80% of documents automatically, routing exceptions to human processors for review.

## Technical Specifications

| Feature | Specification |
|---------|---------------|
| Deployment Options | Cloud (SaaS), on-premise, hybrid |
| Error Rate | 0.1% (claimed) |
| Processing Volume | 100 billion+ pages processed |
| Document Types | 1,000+ supported types |
| Supported Languages | 22+ languages |
| Document Formats | PDF, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, Word, Excel, email attachments |
| Machine Learning | Deep neural networks, computer vision, NLP |
| Processing Accuracy | 90-99% depending on document complexity (claimed) |
| Integration Methods | REST APIs, webhooks, RPA integration |
| Security | SOC 2, GDPR compliance, data encryption |
| Scalability | Enterprise-grade high-volume processing |

## Getting Started

1. **Discovery**: Assess document types and current processing workflows
2. **Proof of Concept**: Test with sample documents for accuracy validation
3. **Configuration**: Set up extraction models for specific document types
4. **Integration**: Connect with existing systems and workflows
5. **Optimization**: Continuous improvement through feedback and model refinement
